name: Dame tu Cosita's Education and Learning 3
name_original: Dame tu Cosita's Education and Learning 3
description:
He's Back for the THIRD TIME!

Dame tu Cosita's Education and Learning 3 is the newest addition to the Dame tu Cosita's Education and Learning franchise!

Dame tu Cosita has invited you to his school-house for the third time in a row, and just when you think things can't get worse than they already have, things DO in fact get worse, as Dame tu Cosita wants you to spell the word cat, and as we all know... you cannot spell the word cat.

Will you survive Dame tu Cosita and his odd tendency of wanting your little thing?

View the Cosita Collection HERE!

Featuring:

  • High octane gameplay, as you get chased by Dame tu Cosita
  • Real learning! You can learn how to spell the word cat!
  • Real ray traced graphics! You can smell the pixels!
  • A soundtrack consisting of Dame tu Cosita, Dame tu Cosita, and you guessed it, Dame tu Cosita! All made by El Chombo!

You will love this game! Play with your friends and family for emotional support <3
